data.name: Truck Driver - USA Paint Jobs DLC
data.detailed_description:
About USA Paint Jobs DLC

Whether it’s the American flag on your truck, the U.S. National Symbol or the Statue of Liberty, with this pack you can drive around in Truck Driver with American pride. All paint jobs are applicable to every in-game truck. The pack includes:

  • American flag
  • American Bald Eagle
  • Route 66 emblem
  • Washington D.C. skyline
  • Statue of Liberty
  • Monument Valley
data.about_the_game:
About USA Paint Jobs DLC

Whether it’s the American flag on your truck, the U.S. National Symbol or the Statue of Liberty, with this pack you can drive around in Truck Driver with American pride. All paint jobs are applicable to every in-game truck. The pack includes:

  • American flag
  • American Bald Eagle
  • Route 66 emblem
  • Washington D.C. skyline
  • Statue of Liberty
  • Monument Valley
data.short_description: Customize your truck in all-American style. With six unique USA themed paint jobs, you can create a truck that perfectly suits your love for the United States of America.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2,6Ghz / AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 3800+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 4th Gen / AMD A10 series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 770 or AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
